title: How to useChroma Packs?
body: I just bought a chroma pack for Garen{{champion:86}} , but when i go into a blind or draft game, it dies not let me select the colors on the skins tab like riot says it should. Is this just a result of it being out so early and will i have to wait for who knows how long, or is it just with me? Any help?

replies.body: It should be working from what I can tell. After picking the proper skin (I believe Garen's Chroma is for his Base Skin), there should be an option to augment the colors. I've attached a I've taken; if it looks different from yours, can you provide me a screenshot of what you're seeing?

Thank you for your help. They seem to be working now, at least in the custom game ive tried so far, and if i need anymore help ill let you know. I guess there just seemed to be a delay from when i bought the chromas to when they started showing up. :)

Thank You for posting this screenshot of what we were suppose to be looking for. I now see this option on each of the chroma packs I bought. I hope the issue has been resolved for ImpulseNE.
Could it be possible that there was a delay for this option to show once the Chroma Packs were purchased?
I can't say for sure, but I just purchased the Chroma Pack for the purpose of testing the feature when I saw this post. There wasn't a delay for me as it was available immediately.
